document_data.name: ''Scroll of Protection from Possession''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''scroll of protection from possession''''' was a [[scroll]] capable of protecting the reader from any attempts at possession.
document_data.Powers: Reading this scroll generated a {{SI|10|ft}} sphere that moved around the reader, protecting anyone inside the sphere from magical forms of possession or mental control such as a ''[[magic jar]]'' [[spell]]. These effects lasted for ten minutes to one hour, but a small percentage of these scrolls lasted for several hours but conjured a stationary sphere of protection.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Hasan ibn al-Din]], a [[Corsair (kit)|corsair]] travelling the [[Great Sea]] near [[Zakhara]], carried a ''scroll of protection from possession''.
